00020 #include "CelFileWriterTest.h"
00021 #include "CalvinCelFileWriter.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 
00026 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CelFileWriterTest );
00027 
00028 void CelFileWriterTest::setUp() {}
00029 
00030 void CelFileWriterTest::tearDown() {}
00031 
00032 void CelFileWriterTest::testCreation()
00033 {
00034         CelFileData fHdr("cel_file");
00035         CelFileWriter* w = new CelFileWriter(fHdr);
00036         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00037         delete w;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CelFileWriterTest::WriteTest()
00041 {
00042         std::string celFileName = "cel_file";
00043         CelFileData writerData(celFileName);
00044         writerData.SetIntensityCount(10);
00045         writerData.SetStdDevCount(10);
00046         writerData.SetPixelCount(10);
00047         writerData.SetOutlierCount(10);
00048         writerData.SetMaskCount(10);
00049 
00050     writerData.SetArrayType(L"arraytype");
00051     writerData.SetMasterFileName(L"masterfile");
00052     writerData.SetLibraryPackageName(L"libpackage");
00053 
00054         CelFileWriter writer(writerData);
00055 
00056         FloatVector intensities;
00057         intensities.push_back(10.0);
00058         intensities.push_back(11.0);
00059         intensities.push_back(12.0);
00060         intensities.push_back(13.0);
00061         writer.WriteIntensities(intensities);
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00063 
00064         FloatVector stdDevs;
00065         stdDevs.push_back(10.0);
00066         stdDevs.push_back(11.0);
00067         stdDevs.push_back(12.0);
00068         stdDevs.push_back(13.0);
00069         writer.WriteStdDevs(stdDevs);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00071 
00072         Int16Vector pixels;
00073         pixels.push_back(10);
00074         pixels.push_back(11);
00075         pixels.push_back(12);
00076         pixels.push_back(13);
00077         writer.WritePixels(pixels);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00079 
00080         CelFileData readerData;
00081         CelFileReader reader;
00082         reader.SetFilename(celFileName);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(readerData));
00084 
00085         // Read some data
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == celFileName);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.HasNumPixels());
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.HasStdev());
00089 
00090     
00091     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetArrayType() == L"arraytype");
00092     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetMasterFileName() == L"masterfile");
00093     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetLibraryPackageName() == L"libpackage");
00094 }
